title: @Herald Evangele
body: So you dont like people's comments so you remove them, is that how it works here? Because i've seen stuff alot more offensive than me calling someone a whiney bitch in these forums. But hey let's all bow to the great power you have of removing people's comments in here. Real big shot.

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} Hi!

Yes, removing comments is part of my job or "powers" as a moderator. Boards has a set of rules that you need to adhere to in order to post here. You can find these located here:
[Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE)

Calling people "whiny bitches" directly violates the Golden Rule: Always be respectful to players, community members, moderators, and Rioters.

If you have any other questions I'd be happy to answer them.

Well gooood job Evangele, you caught the villain. Now the boards are safe and sound again, with noooobody making such comments and being SUPER nice to each other, as we speak. *rolls eyes*. 

Have a..... Good.... day.

{{champion:267}} Hey, thanks!

If you ever see comments that violate the Universal Rules yourself, you can report them to us so we can take a look at them!

Hope you have a great holiday season :)

I'm no snitch.

...but yea, happy holidays to you too. =)
Learn to be one then, instead of crying when you get caught breaking rules.

I've seen people get away with murder yet I get singled out by the police for stealing.

That damn power abuse.

Kidding aside, a breach of the rules is a breach of the rules. It doesn't matter that there are worse offenders out there.
How can you know who removed your comment/discussion though?

Well "Herald Evangele" was the last thing written on the notification I got saying my comment was removed for "offending a fellow member". So I can only assume that's the mod's name. Because I once double posted a thread by mistake and got a similar notification saying one of them was removed, that mod's name was around the same area.

Either ways... I called some dude a whiney B... guarantee you go on the first page of the boards **right now** and you'll find 10 worse comments than that, which aren't being removed.
Please report those then so that the moderators can see and take action! Unreported comments are far more likely to go unnoticed.

>guarantee you go on the first page of the boards right now and you'll find 10 worse comments than that which aren't being removed.

Then report them and we'll take a look.
Lol right? I swear, people these days.
Wasn't aware. In the EU boards it doesn't work like that.
